name: Fire Emblem: Deity Device
summary:
Deity Device is a heavily story driven romhack of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones created by the user Permafrost. The game begins with a young noblewoman on a pilgrimage with her band of knights, but she is diverted when her brother is kidnapped, gradually being drawn into the larger plot. Both the gameplay and story are strongly inspired by Genealogy of the Holy War; with a focus on large maps and political schemes.

The game features:
-39 Main Story Chapters and 10 Gaiden Chapters
-A smaller more developed cast of 26 playable units
-An all new magic system
